metadata.title: CVE-2023-38252 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in w3m, in the Strnew_size function inStr.c. This issue may allow an attacker to cause a denial of servicethrough a crafted HTML file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38252` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

w3m - 0.5.3+git20210102-6ubuntu0.2
w3m-img - 0.5.3+git20210102-6ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: w3m package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5.3+git20210102-6ubuntu0.2').
